longBusinessSummary: Quizam Media Corporation, together with its subsidiaries, engages in the cannabis retail business in Canada. It operates through Training Services and United Kingdom (UK) On-Track TV; Software and Licensing; and Quantum 1 Cannabis's Retail Sales and Consulting Services segments. The company sells pre-packaged cannabis products and accessories, such as flowers, oils, pre-rolls, vapes, cartridges, and edibles, through retail cannabis dispensaries under the Quantum1 brand. It also markets computer-based educational software programs; and engages in film production activities. In addition, the company offers computer and software training, and consulting services through face-to-face and online means; and OnTrackTV, an online library of short learning vignettes for the UK market. Further, it provides website development, database design and development, project management consulting, office networking consulting, video production and editing, e-learning course design, Microsoft Office, and Adobe services; computer training lab rental; and soft skills training, which includes technical, business, and management skills. Quizam Media Corporation is based in Vancouver, Canada.

companyOfficers.name: Mr. Dave  Babych
companyOfficers.title: Community Relations Director & Member of the Advisory Board
